description: This source file implements classes related to application state change notification and listener management for the AWC (possibly Application or Application Window Controller). It defines methods for adding/removing listeners, notifying about state changes, and handling window events (though the window change notification is intentionally left empty). The file interacts with external classes/interfaces such as AWCStateChangeListener and uses tracing for logging.

classes.name: AWCStateChangeNotifier
classes.description: Manages a list of listeners interested in application state changes, providing methods to add, remove, and notify listeners.

classes.name: AWCListener
classes.description: Responds to window change and application state change notifications and forwards these to the associated notifier.

methods.name: void addListener(AWCStateChangeListener * listener)
methods.description: Adds a listener to the notifier if it is not already registered.

methods.name: void removeListener(AWCStateChangeListener * listener)
methods.description: Removes a listener from the notifier.

methods.name: void notify(int req_id,awc::awc_app_state_t app_state,int status,unsigned int pid)
methods.description: Notifies all registered listeners of a change in application state.

methods.name: AWCListener()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the listener with a notifier reference.

methods.name: void notifyWindowChange(int window_id VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,awc::AWCClient::awc_window_state_t window_state VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,unsigned int pid VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED)
methods.description: Handles window change notifications; intentionally left empty.

methods.name: void notifyStateChange(int req_id,awc::awc_app_state_t app_state,int status,unsigned int pid)
methods.description: Handles application state change notifications and forwards them to the notifier.

methods.name: void notifyServiceReady()
methods.description: Indicates that the service is ready; currently performs no action.

ctags.name: notify
ctags.pattern: /^void AWCStateChangeNotifier::notify(int req_id, awc::awc_app_state_t app_state, int status, unsi/

ctags.name: notifyStateChange
ctags.pattern: /^void AWCListener::notifyStateChange(int req_id, awc::awc_app_state_t app_state, int status, unsi/

ctags.name: notifyWindowChange
ctags.signature: (int window_id VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,awc::AWCClient::awc_window_state_t window_state VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,unsigned int pid VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED)
